title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, stream, embed, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin settings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, and embed operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, and list models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama’s REST endpoints with ergonomic commands and colorful output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Python toolkit wrapping Ollama for chemistry Q&A and molecule generation using fine-tuned ChemLLM models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy support for Ollama, letting you call local models through the same OpenAI-compatible interface as cloud providers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server and WebUI containers with GPU or CPU modes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and llama-index to chat with local PDFs entirely offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models in chat channels with slash commands and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package; 10k+ weekly downloads and zero native dependencies.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package; 50k+ monthly downloads and full asyncio support.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for discussing Ollama models, troubleshooting, benchmarks, and sharing community projects.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Experimental Go plugin adding HNSW vector index support to Ollama for fast approximate nearest-neighbor search on embeddings.
